divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: We were driving past the high school and looked up to see a light near the Olmos Park area. We followed it to Olmos Park. When we got out, it was about 9:00 p.m., it had been dark for about an hour, so it was hard to see anything except a bright illuminated outline of a creature in the park. We got out to inspect the situation. There were a few other men with flashlights who helped. Then the figure disappeared, like faded. Uh, what should I do? I m not sure who to call. There were some bent bushes and alot of witnesses in the park, but I m not sure how reliable they ll be.
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around April 16th 2005
